content_html:
Kathmandu, September 15

Kulman Ghising, who has built a reputation among the public for his effective management of the energy sector, has been entrusted with three ministries in the government led by Prime Minister Sushila Karki.

The former executive director of the Nepal Electricity Authority will oversee the Ministry of Energy, Water Resources and Irrigation, the Ministry of Physical Infrastructure and Transport, and the Ministry of Urban Development.

The post Kulman Ghising assigned 3 ministries in Karki-led government appeared first on OnlineKhabar English News.
